messages.subject: Re: Fwd: [coreknowledge] Please write ... homeschooler c...
messages.msgSnippet: Here is a copy of my response to the Stillwater Gazette: I would like to respond to the comic last Thursday in the Stillwater Gazette. The comic portrays the
messages.messageBody:
Here is a copy of my response to the Stillwater Gazette:
I would like to respond to the comic last Thursday in the Stillwater Gazette.
The comic portrays the ignorance of it's creator. This is not at all what
homeschooling is like. Many people have homeschooled for years. We do not
homeschool in response to the latest violent episodes in our school systems.
The media seems to enjoy linking the two. I suggest you send a reporter to
find out who homeschools, why and how they accomplish this instead of
stereotyping us.

Sincerely,

Cynthia M. Berkowitz
